main event: An observer sighted red lights arranged in a square pattern twice in one night near Newport News, Virginia, in 1969.
interesting points: The observer reported a circular, silvery-white object hovering above the trees,The object remained stationary for about 5 minutes before moving off to the southwest at high speed,The lights were described as unusual and located in a square formation,The time between the two sightings is unclear,The observer noted that the object did not make any sound during the observation.
sighted object: red lights arranged in a square pattern and a circular, silvery-white object
witness description: an individual who observed the phenomenon from a few miles south of Newport News
